![Loong Scales .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/54/Loong_Scales_.jpg)| Loong Scales| Legendary | "These ancient loong scales occasionally flicker with lightning. img_summary: The image depicts the "Sterness of Stone," a rare item in *Black Myth: Wukong*. This mysterious artifact, obtained by defeating the Stone Vanguard boss in Fright Cliff - Rockrest Flat, is used to unlock mechanisms throughout Chapter 2 in Yellow Wind Ridge. Specifically, it interacts with the "Keeness of Tiger" to access hidden paths and open doors, such as those in the Crouching Tiger Temple, Sandgate Village, and Yellow Sand Formation. The item's design reflects its role as a key to progression in the game.
